yoruba: Bí a kò bá tó ìyà-á kọ̀ tí à ńkọ̀ ọ́, àjẹkún ìyà là ńjẹ.
gold: If one lacks the means to reject suffering and attempts to reject it, one's suffering simply multiplies.
gen:
Yoruba: Bí a kò bá tó ìyà-á kọ̀ tí à ńkọ̀ ọ́, àjẹkún ìyà là ńjẹ.
English: If one doesn't have the ability to reject suffering but tries to reject it anyway, one will suffer endlessly.
